post_content.caption: Nagpur Violence | 'Whatever Damage Has Happened...': CM Devendra Fadnavis Vows To Punish Rioters
post_content.description:
Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis said that any damage caused during the violent clashes in Nagpur on March 17 will be recovered from the rioters. “Whatever damage has happened will be recovered from the rioters. If they do not pay the money, then their property will be sold for the recovery. Wherever required, bulldozers will also be used,” said Devendra Fadnavis.

#NagpurViolence #DevendraFadnavis #MaharashtraNews #NagpurRiots #FadnavisOnNagpurViolence #AurangzebTombRow #AurangzebNews

publisher_desc:
NDTV is one of the leaders in the production and broadcasting of un-biased and comprehensive news and entertainment programs in India and abroad. 

It offers round-the-clock coverage of latest news and has a unique mix of news bulletins, current affairs, talk shows, and general interest and entertainment programs. 

The company operates NDTV 24X7, an English news channel; NDTV India, a Hindi news channel; and NDTV Profit. NDTV's verticals cover an entire gamut of news and beyond news encompassing recipes, travel, entertainment, shopping, books, health, gadgets and special features. 

NDTV delivers reliable information across all platforms: TV, Internet and Mobile. 

NDTV broadcasts its programmes in Sri Lanka,  Bangladesh, Maldives, Nepal, Middle East, Mauritius, South Africa, Europe, US, Canada & ANZ.
